comments: When using value_format DELIMITED, we can define DELIMITER_FORMAT as per org.apache.commons.csv.CSVFormat
Supported value DEFAULT, EXCEL, INFORMIX_UNLOAD, INFORMIX_UNLOAD_CSV, MYSQL, RFC4180, ORACLE, POSTGRESQL_CSV,

tests.name: select delimited value_format
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID bigint, NAME varchar, VALUE integer) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE TABLE S2 as SELECT id, name, value FROM test;

tests.name: select delimited value_format with tab separated values
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID bigint, NAME varchar, VALUE integer) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED', delimiter_format='TDF');
CREATE TABLE S2 as SELECT id, name, value FROM test;
